text: kraoyomk yeung ban thveu aoy saou lai mean yl ampi ruengokdei nih . haey yeung ban bratan pheap chhleasavei ning chamnehdoeng dl ke teangpir . ruochhaey yeung ban thveu aoy phnom ning hvaung satvasleab cheachraenleuk tamkeung sarsaer( champoh yeung) ruom cheamuoy da vou d . haey yeung kuchea anakathveu rueng teangnih
